description: Affects chances of successfully casting magic spells.
Improves defenses against enemy magic spells.
Increases damage-to-inflict with weapons in hand-to-hand combat.
Each rank in Strength increases Damage by 5%.
Increases damage-to-inflict with ranged weapons in combat.
Each rank in Dexterity increases Damage by 5%.
Affects HP directly. Represents the real physical damage your
character can take before dying. Endurance also affects turn speed.
Affects Action Points in battle and is used by magic spells
and some skill actions. Stamina is also lost when
taking damage from attacks. When Stamina hits zero,
your character will experience combat penalties.
